nodes.text:
@mikaeladraws aside from already mentioned
Chicago Torture Justice Center provides services to victims of police torture
A Just Harvest provides food to folks who need it
Invisible Institute works on police accountability and collecting stories from victims of police violence

@mikaeladraws Lucy Parsons Project is an all volunteer-run group working to expose Chicago police surveillance through research and public records requests, also documenting police abuse around the city \nLove & Protect supports criminalized survivors of domestic and gendered violence
@dtkindlerphoto @GKMC18 Thankyou! They were who I just thought of too, setting a lil something up
